sentences.en: He expected righteousness, but instead , an outcry of distress!
sentences.cn: 指望的是公义, 谁知倒有哀声!

sentences.en: If they try to close the library there'll be a great outcry.
sentences.cn: 如果他们试图关闭图书馆,会引起强烈的反对.

sentences.en: If they try to close the railway, there'll a great outcry.
sentences.cn: 如果他们试图关闭那条铁路, 一定会遭到强烈的反对.

sentences.en: Pork set up an outcry which she found infuriating.
sentences.cn: 波克令人生气地大喝了一声.

sentences.en: The closure of the local hospital has caused a huge public outcry.
sentences.cn: 当地医院的关闭激起了大规模的公众抗议。

sentences.en: The crime elicited an outcry against illicit drugs.
sentences.cn: 那起罪行引发了打击违禁药品的呼声。

sentences.en: The howling monster with his outcry filled the cavern.
sentences.cn: 山洞里回荡着这个咆哮如雷的巨兽的嗥叫声.

sentences.en: The open outcry system will continue.
sentences.cn: 公开竞价体系还将继续.

sentences.en: The public outcry forced the leaders to debate the new laws.
sentences.cn: 公众的呼声迫使领导者认真考虑新的法律.

sentences.en: There was a great outcry about the construction of the new airport.
sentences.cn: 公众强烈反对修建该机场.

sentences.en: There was a public outcry [ clamour ] .
There was a public outcry about the building of a new airport.
sentences.cn: 公众强烈反对修建新机场.

sentences.en: There was a public outcry when the scandal broke.
sentences.cn: 丑闻传开后引起了公愤.

sentences.en: This proposition was greeted with an immediate outcry of protest from Chang Su - su and Wu Chih - sheng.
sentences.cn: 他这话刚出口,立刻就引起了 张素素 与吴芝生两个人的大叫.

sentences.en: We raise an outcry for north - south dialogue.
sentences.cn: 我们强烈要求 南北 对话.

sentences.en: When the young lady missed her watch, she made a great outcry in the park.
sentences.cn: 那位小姐发现失掉了表, 她在公园里大喊起来.

trans.tran_cn: 高声叫喊，尖叫，公开反对，强烈抗议，拍卖，叫卖
trans.tran_en: an angry protest by a lot of ordinary people
